Metadata: "Wet and wild." A multidisciplinaâ€‹ry marine education teacher guide. Grades K-6, Unit V;The economic sea: Riches of the sea

This unit of the "Wet and Wild" series for K-6 instruction covers economic aspects of the sea, with sections on living and nonliving resources, shipping and commerce, merchant marine fleet protection, and recreational uses. Supplementary activities, clam digging, a bibliography and film listing are also included. A Spanish translation is provided.
